c.sqlit: SELECT domainId, domainName, fullpath FROM a_domain d where parentId is null order by d.fullpath
SELECT domainId, domainName, fullpath FROM a_domain d where parentId = '%s' order by d.fullpath

c.mysql: select orgId value, orgName text from a_orgs
c.sqlit: select orgId value, orgName text from a_orgs

c.mysql: select roleId as value,roleName as text from a_roles
c.sqlit: select roleId as value,roleName as text from a_roles

c.mysql: select c.orgId, c.orgName as text, c.parent, p.orgName pname, fullpath from a_orgs c join (select orgName, orgId from a_orgs) p on p.orgId = c.parent order by fullpath
SELECT funcId, parentId, funcName, url, sibling sort, fullpath, css, flags FROM a_sys_functions f where flags != '0' order by f.fullpath
c.sqlit: SELECT funcId, parentId, funcName, url, sibling sort, fullpath, css, flags FROM a_functions f where flags != '0' order by f.fullpath

c.mysql: select r.roleId is not null checked, funcName text, f.funcId, parentId,f.sibling sort, fullpath from a_sys_functions f left outer join a_role_funcs r on r.funcId = f.funcId and r.roleId = '%s' order by fullpath
c.sqlit: select r.roleId is not null checked, funcName text, f.funcId, parentId,f.sibling sort, fullpath from a_functions f left outer join a_role_func r on r.funcId = f.funcId and r.roleId = '%s' order by fullpath

select h.pid, '%1$s' || '.' || h.folder folder, h.tags, h.shareby, h.pname, h.pdate sort, family || '.' || h.folder || h.pid fullpath, 'doc' nodetype, css, filesize, null pdf, null txt, null zip, 1 total, case when (geox != 0) then geox || ',' || geoy end geo, null fav, mime from h_photos h where family = '%1$s' and (substr(mime, 0, 6) != 'image' and substr(mime, 0, 6) != 'video' and substr(mime, 0, 6) !='audio') union select * from ( select '%1$s' || '.' || folder, '%1$s' folder, max(tags) tags, max(shareby) shareby, folder pname, folder sort, family || '.' || folder fullpath, 'dir' nodetype, css, null filesize, sum(case when substr(mime, 0, 16) = 'application/pdf' then 1 else 0 end) pdf, sum(case when substr(mime, 0, 5) = 'text' then 1 else 0 end) txt, sum(case when substr(mime, 0, 16) = 'application/zip' then 1 else 0 end) zip, sum(case when mime is not null then 1 else 0 end) total, sum(CASE WHEN geox != 0 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) geo , 0 fav, mime from h_photos f where f.family = '%1$s' and substr(mime, 0, 6) != 'image' and substr(mime, 0, 6) != 'video' and substr(mime, 0, 6) !='audio' group by f.folder ) where total > 0 order by fullpath
